Legal.definition: of or relating to law or the processes of law [a question] [take action] 2 a

1.definition: of or relating to law or the processes of law [a question] [take action]

2 a.definition: deriving authority from or founded on law [a tariff rate] [a government]

sub_terms.b: fulfilling the requirements of law [a voter]
sub_terms.c: having a status derived from lawrecognized as such by law [a certainty]
sub_terms.d: created by operation of esp. statutory law [ incompetence] [a presumption] compare,
sub_terms.e: established by law [the test for mental capacity]

3.definition: conforming to or permitted by law[a referendum to make gambling ]

4.definition: recognized or made effective under principles of law as distinguished from principles of equityderiving from or existing or valid in law as distinguished from equity see alsocompare

5 a.definition: of, relating to, or having the characteristics of the profession of law or one of its members [a corporate department] [the community]

sub_terms.b: of or relating to the study of law [continuing education]
